paper_abstract: We generalize to any finite fields F-q a theorem about covering radius of codes of strength 2 proved by Helleseth and coworkers. Then, using this result and partial covering radius, we give bounds for the covering radius of first-order generalized Reed-Muller codes. Finally, using Magma, we get some improvements for F-3.
paper_title: On the Covering Radius of First-Order Generalized Reed-Muller Codes
